title: Sesame steak with spicy green beans

For the sesame steak: 55g/2oz rump steak, trimmed and cut into 5 thin strips

steps: For the spicy green beans, heat the oil in a frying pan, add the beans, pepper and onion and fry for a few minutes until softened.
Add the garlic and chilli flakes and fry for a further 3-4 minutes.
For the sesame steak, thread each steak strip onto a cocktail stick and drizzle over the honey.
Heat a little oil in a non-stick frying pan and fry the steak over a high heat for 4-5 minutes, or until cooked through and golden-brown.
To serve, sprinkle the steak with sesame seeds and place onto a serving plate with the spicy green beans.
